ygData.subject: An Alliance-to a point and the unwanted visitor
ygData.msgSnippet: Allitron looked at Megatron, It would be fool hardy for us to form an alliance out of haste. So I propose this, Iron Fist will remain neutral for now, but you

Subject: An Alliance-to a point and the unwanted visitor
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
From: Roaklin <roaklin@...>


  Allitron looked at Megatron, "It would be fool hardy
for us to form an alliance out of haste. So I propose
this, Iron Fist will remain neutral for now, but you
and a few of your troops at a time can stay aboard her
provided you announce your visist. We can provide
mutual support for one another until such date that we
trust each other and maybe then form an alliance."

  One of the drones called Panzertron over.

  "Sir, I've been monitering a energy signature that
is underneath the ship."

  " Any holo cams in that area?"

  The monitor flickered on and the form of Magmatron
could be seen making his way along the ship's under
belly.

   "Major take care of the intruder," Allitron said.

   Panzertron exited the bridge.
